title: Residential radon exposure and brain cancer: an ecological study in a radon prone area (Galicia, Spain)
abstract: The model takes the following form:\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$\begin{array}{l}{O}_{i}\sim Po({E}_{i}{\lambda }_{i})\\ \mathrm{log}({\lambda }_{i})=\alpha +{h}_{i}+{b}_{i}\end{array}$$\end{document}Oi∼Po(Eiλi)log(λi)=α+hi+biwhere: λ i is the relative risk in area i; Oi is the number of deaths in area i; Po is Poisson distribution; α is the intercept; Ei are the expected number of cases; hi is the municipal heterogeneity term; and bi is the spatial term.
